Articles.Content:
Hi everyone

 

I'm Messier, and I've been playing KSP ever since 2013 when I got it for my birthday. However, I never made a forum account because I didn't even know the forums existed.  I'd say I'm decent at the game. I can dock, get to orbit, go to the Mun and Minmus and go to Duna, Ike and Eve. However, I cannot go to any other planets. I did quit playing in 2014 and just came back a couple months ago, so I'm pretty rusty. Well, that's all I have to say. 

 

See ya!
Wwlcome to the Forum Messier, there's a lot of fun stuff  in the new releases... I can't even remember if we had antenna ranges in 2014, anyway, have fun!
Wow! Thanks for the warm welcome guys. Other forums that I've been on have been pretty rude to new members. You guys are very kind!
Welcome to the forums! thx for posting in my topic.
